EmailTemplate.name: EU Onboarding Completed Email Tempate
EmailTemplate.subject: Project {!EBH_Project__c.Name} is completed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!EBH_Project__c.CategoryManager__c},
Project {!EBH_Project__c.Name} has been moved to the status "Completed".
Project is closed by Acquisition and Merchant Integration team now and handed over to you as category manager.
eBay Team
